Class Sensors

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • robot.Sensors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class Sensors
extends Thread
    Class containing all the methods for the project.
    Author:
    Jeremias Korhonen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sensors

        public Sensors()
        throws DestinationUnreachableException
        Constructor used in all of the Behavior classes. Sets up the motors, sensors, camera and navigator. Bounds for the map are currently 600x300.
        Throws:
        DestinationUnreachableException

      • haeTulos

        public double haeTulos()
        Uses the IR sensor to see, if there is anything in front of the robot
        Returns:
        Distance to the object

      • KohdeEdessa

        public boolean KohdeEdessa()
        Returns:
        True, if an object is within a certain distance to the robot

      • laskeX

        public double laskeX()
        Calculates the x-coordinate of the scanned object Two calculations if the robot is moving to or from the x axis
        Returns:
        The calculated x-coordinate

      • laskeY

        public double laskeY()
        Calculates the y-coordinate of the scanned object Two calculations if the robot is moving to or from the y axis
        Returns:
        The calculated y-coordinate

      • nollaaKamera

        public void nollaaKamera()
        Resets the camera's motor back to the starting position

      • onkoPaassa

        public boolean onkoPaassa()
        Checks, if the robot reaches its end point
        Returns:
        A boolean value. True, if the robot has reached its end location

      • painettu

        public boolean painettu()
        Used in the Stop class takeControl() method
        Returns:
        True, if the emergency button has been pressed

      • Palaamassa

        public void Palaamassa()
        Sets a boolean value to true so we know, that the robot is returning

        public void RobotMene()
               throws DestinationUnreachableException
        Commands the robot to follow the current path
        Throws:
        DestinationUnreachableException - if the location is out of bounds

        Parameters:

      • Tutki

        public boolean Tutki()
        Rotates the camera's motor on a 140 degree angle
        Returns:
        True, if the camera detects an object
